title: Does this security photo show Andrew McCabe's escort outside the FBI building?
subtitle: The picture of the former Deputy Director of the Federal Bureau of Investigation with a group of armed officers is real, but it is not recent and does not show that he is being thrown or escorted abroad.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: The photograph shows former FBI Deputy Director Andrew McCabe who was escorted outside the building by security after he left his site in January 2018.
